contents.about: My name is Eduardo Borges. I'm an Unity Game Programmer based in Venezuela, with some experience as a professional Full Stack Developer. I have worked as Lead programmer at a Venezuelan indie game company called 3DAvenue and I'm currently searching for job in this industry. Meanwhile, I'm working in prototyping some game ideas that I have had for a long time. My dream is to make games that everyone can enjoy.
contents.name: <0>Fullname</0>: {{value}}
